item.description:
With the welcoming warm April, lets get to the water for kayaking / canoeing in Charles river. The exact location to meet is N 42°20.683'; W 71°15.582' :)

We will meet at 10.45 am at the Newton Boat house, do the paper work for rentals and be on the water by 11.00am. This is also a scenic stretch of flat water with lots of wildlife along the river, you may bring your camera, but keep it safe from water.

There is rental charge for the kayaks/canoes. We will plan to do about 2 hours, so if renting solo, it would be around $30.00pp, dual/shared ones would be 18.00pp (prices are approximate ballpark, pl check at store). Do bring your license/ID, bottle(s) of water. After the trip, we can stop at newton for sandwich/lunch.

There is a parking lot little further from the boathouse, it is little tricky to find out, you may stop at the boathouse to get directions.Rental/boathouse[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet at the paddle store.
item.name: Kayaking/Canoeing in Charles River @ Newton
